title: HELP!! I CAN'T CONNECT TO CHAT!!!
body: This has been happening for 3 hours now and I'm starting to panic. I can't connect to chat. Please help me fix this problem I need friends {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: OK ANOTHER UPDATE (sorry for confusing you guys xD) with 20+ attempts I was able to get back in. BUT I'm still having the same problems, I still cant reconnect to chat ;-;
I literally told you this was a problem with all of OCE. obviously errors take more than an hour or so to fix if its on such a large scale.

Its a problem with all of OCE. Riot is currently working on this. If it is indeed the same problem. 
Chill bro. All will be fixed.
OK! THINGS ARE GETTING WORST! I tried restarting my league and now I'm having troubles logging in...... PLS HELP! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
